attributes.action: call a general election in order for the British people to have confidence in both the leadership of the country and its economic future.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the ongoing issues surrounding the Brown government and the current economic crisis the people of Great Britain feel like their government is out of touch with what they want.  In order for the politicians to listen to the British people and for the people themselves to have a say in the way the country is run the Prime Minister should call a general election for the new year.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
